definition: to serve in the army/in active service

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: Akinjis, meaning 'raiders', are light cavalry serving in Muslim forces.
sentences.chinese: 阿金基意爲騎兵，是服役於穆斯林軍中的輕騎兵部隊。

sentences.english: I was in the military for 6 years.
Last week she ordered a halt to all dismissals of gay service members.
sentences.chinese: 上週，該法官下令暫停解僱所有同性戀服役人員。

sentences.english: I served in a parachute regiment. During a nighttime exercise, I was seated next to a young officer.
Image above: Three of NASA's four Great Observatories are still in service. Credit: NASA
sentences.chinese: 四大觀測器中，仍有三個在服役。

sentences.english: Describe your military service in your home country, giving the time and the unit you belonged to.
sentences.chinese: 簡述你在所屬國家服役的情況，說明時間和所屬部隊。

sentences.english: During World War II he served in the Navy aboard the submarine tender U.S.S. Proteus.
sentences.chinese: 二戰期間他在海軍潛艇供應船普羅特斯號服役。

sentences.english: Soon after she was selected, Ms. Fauci re-enlisted for four more years.
sentences.chinese: 在她入選後不久，費希女士將服役期限延長了四年。

sentences.english: He formerly served in the Iran-Iraq war and as national police chief.
sentences.chinese: 他以前曾在伊朗伊拉克戰爭中服役，並擔任警察局長。

sentences.english: He was drafted by the army and served for four years.
The long pin axle of dig-loading machine are fractured after three months′use.
sentences.chinese: 挖掘裝載機服役僅三個月剷鬥長銷軸即斷裂。

sentences.english: Both men were U.S. Marines assigned to Alpha Company, Battalion 1/8.
sentences.chinese: 兩人生前均服役於美國海軍陸戰隊8團1營A連。

sentences.english: It will then decide whether to extend the lives of the plants.
sentences.chinese: 該國將考慮是否延長這幾座電站的服役期。

sentences.english: It is the second of the carriers due to enter into service by 2020.
sentences.chinese: 這是第二艘訂服役到2020年的航空母艦。

sentences.english: And the hand of the house of Joseph was heavy upon him, and he became tributary to him.
sentences.chinese: 但在若瑟家族勢力強大之後，他們就成了服役的人。
